title: Why was I charged again?
content:
Grammarly is currently set to recurring payment cycles. Your subscription will automatically renew at the standard pricing and cadence unless you cancel before the end of the billing period. See our
Terms of Service
for more information.
You can cancel your subscription to prevent future billing by following the steps in this article:
How do I cancel my Grammarly subscription?
Please
contact Support
if you have any further questions.
